en.title: Testimonial - Quantum Pendant
en.content:
Sensei Okazaki Founder International Shotokan Karate Federation.
  FusionExcel in the Philippines sponsored the February 2009 Okazaki Cup and International Goodwill Championships. Gracing the event was Sensei Shihan Okazaki, founder of the International Shotokan Karate Federation. The ISKF began in 1977 and is currently present in 43 countries. FusionExcel is happy to sponsor the event.  
 
Both martial arts experts, FusionExcel Philippines endorser Monsour del Rosario (Olympian TaeKwondo Player) and Sensei Shihan Okazaki (Founder ISKF), share a light moment together.  Below: Monsour doing a flexibility test on Sensei Okazaki and Samboy Lim doing a balance test on the Sensei.  Sensei Okazaki is amazed with the strength, balance, flexibility and focus instantly received by wearers of the Quantum Pendant!
The Winners of the International Shotokan Karate Federation Okazaki Cup receives a Quantum Pendant from William Duguil.
All happy users of FusionExcel Quantum Pendant: Monsour del Rosario (FusionExcel Endorser), Sensei Okazaki (Founder ISKF), Samboy Lim (FusionExcel Endorser & Director), Jojie Mercado (ISKF Instructor USA) & William Duguil (FusionExcel Director).
